mapper.sql: select distinct m.tenant_id, m.system_id, m.menu_id as menu_menu_id, m.system_id as menu_system_id, m.name as menu_name, m.parent_id as menu_parent_id, m.path as menu_path, m.component as menu_component, m.query as menu_query, m.is_common as menu_is_common, m.is_change as menu_is_change, m.is_frame as menu_is_frame, m.is_cache as menu_is_cache, m.menu_type as menu_menu_type, m.visible as menu_visible, m.status as menu_status, ifnull(m.perms, '') as menu_perms, m.icon as menu_icon, m.sort as menu_sort from sys_menu m

select distinct m.tenant_id, m.menu_id as menu_menu_id, m.system_id as menu_system_id, m.name as menu_name, m.parent_id as menu_parent_id, m.path as menu_path, m.component as menu_component, m.query as menu_query, m.is_common as menu_is_common, m.is_change as menu_is_change, m.is_frame as menu_is_frame, m.is_cache as menu_is_cache, m.menu_type as menu_menu_type, m.visible as menu_visible, m.status as menu_status, ifnull(m.perms, '') as menu_perms, m.icon as menu_icon, m.sort as menu_sort from sys_menu m

select distinct s.tenant_id, s.system_id as system_system_id, s.name as system_name, s.image_url as system_image_url, s.type as system_type, s.route as system_route, s.is_common as system_is_common, s.is_change as system_is_change, s.is_new as system_is_new, s.visible as system_visible, s.status as system_status, s.remark as system_remark, s.sort as system_sort from xy_system s

select sm.tenant_id, s_m_uid, s_m_name, s_m_f_uid, s_m_sort, s_m_type from ( select distinct m.tenant_id, m.menu_id as s_m_uid, m.name as s_m_name, if(m.parent_id = 0, m.system_id, m.parent_id) as s_m_f_uid, m.sort as s_m_sort, 1 as s_m_type, m.status as status, m.del_flag as del_flag from sys_menu m union select distinct s.tenant_id, s.system_id as s_m_uid, s.name as s_m_name, -1 as s_m_f_uid, s.sort as s_m_sort, 0 as s_m_type, s.status as status, s.del_flag as del_flag from xy_system s ) sm
select distinct es.tenant_id from xy_tenant es
select distinct es.tenant_id, es.system_id from xy_system es
mapper.select: where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 and m.del_flag = 0 order by m.sort
where m.tenant_id = #{enterpriseId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 and m.del_flag = 0 order by m.sort
where m.system_id = #{systemId} and m.tenant_id = #{enterpriseId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 and m.del_flag = 0 order by m.sort
where m.status = 0 and m.del_flag = 0 order by m.sort
where m.tenant_id = #{enterpriseId} and m.status = 0 and m.del_flag = 0 order by m.sort
where s.status = 0 and s.del_flag = 0 order by s.sort
where s.tenant_id = #{enterpriseId} and s.status = 0 and s.del_flag = 0 order by s.sort
where sm.status = 0 and sm.del_flag = 0 order by sm.s_m_sort
where sm.tenant_id = #{enterpriseId} and sm.status = 0 and sm.del_flag = 0 order by sm.s_m_sort
